name: Hexax
description:
Hexax is a puzzle arcade game with mathematics, in which the objective is to hit hexagonal pieces with numbers to reach the total goal. In this game, the player can test his aim and his mathematical reasoning, in a fun way.

There are 3 different game modes:

- Classic

- Time Trial

- Arcade

This game was developed by Tiago Duarte, Vanda Freire and Ana Teresa as a 2D project for the bachelor degree in Digital Games and Multimedia @ IPLeiria
